venue.address_2: ( 1 block from Kenmore Square toward Brookline)
venue.name: RISQUE at An Tua Nua

item.description:
Join us for salsa dancing and lesson at An Tua Nua in Kenmore Sq., Boston. We will meet for drinks/food at 7:30. There is also karaoke in the front room. If you have trouble finding us, please call 774 232 0000.

Beginner and Intermediate Salsa Lesson at 9pm, no partner needed

“Learn to dance, meet cool fun people, have some drinks and have a great time! An Tua Nua is a cozy contemporary Irish bar & grill on Beacon Street just outside of Kenmore Square (only about 3 blocks from Sophia's). In the back they have a dance club with a sizable dance floor that holds about 150 people, a bar, and plenty of lounge seating. Irish/America/Bar food available. The food and service is excellent and modestly priced. Entree's are $7-$14. Kitchen is open until 10pm.”

$12 with lesson, $10 without. $2 off coupon available online.

http://salsaboston.co....
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) inside ent.. If need to, please call 774 232 0000
item.name: Salsa Lessons and Dancing, at An Tua Nua, Boston. Optional Karaoke too
